channel.title: Redstone Help
channel.description:
Anyone see whats wrong with this? im trying to open both doors, but the switch will only open one
[URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/268/20110804170920.png/][IMG]http://img268.imageshack.us/img268/1740/20110804170920.png[/img][/URL]

item.title: Redstone Help
item.dc:creator: @mironic mironic
item.description:
@mironic wrote:

i got a perfect set of iron doors :3… if you find my house il show you the wiring.

Read full topic

item.title: Redstone Help
item.dc:creator: @UwillgoBOOM UwillgoBOOM
item.description:
@UwillgoBOOM wrote:

[quote=“noobs are ftw, post:6, topic:408261”][quote author=UwillgoBOOM link=topic=509544.msg3696900#msg3696900 date=1312493461]

you gotta invert the signal for the second door

I tryed that, it just reverses it.

The door that normally opens, doesnt do anything and the one that didnt do anything opens

i said for the second door not both

oh but how would i do that

[/quote]

i suck at explaining so


Just tried it no doors r opening with the pressure plates

EDIT: found another tut works great now

Read full topic
